{{Wired embedded system |brand=Iomega |model=StorCenter |revision=ix2-dl |asin=B008BSIHQM |price=200 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=NAS |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel plug |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6282 |cpu1_cspeed=1.6 GHz |fla1=1 GiB |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9K8G08U0D-SCB0 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CB128M16BP-CG |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, SATA 2, |expansion_usb_num=1 |expansion_sata_num=2 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200,8,N,1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1318 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2A Ultra Low Dropout LDO Regulator;Richtek;RT9025;;1; ,,, 3A Ultra Low Dropout Linear Regulator;ANPEC;APL5930;;2; ,,, Low Drop Adjustable Voltage Regulator;Unisonic;LD1117AG;;1; ,,, 30V P-Channel MOSFET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4407A;;1; ,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4468;;2; ,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4712;;2; ,,, 30V Dual N & P-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDS8958A;;2; ,,, Remote Thermal Monitor and Fan Control;ON Semiconductor;ADT7473;;1; ,,, Dual PWM Step Down Controller w/ Low Power LDO, RTC Regulator;Maxim;MAX17020;;1; ,,, Dual D-type positive-edge-triggered flip-flop;Texas Instruments;SN74AHC74;;1; |flags=RTC w/ battery backup, |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell 3.6.1 - EMC; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.31.8;KW LSP release 5.1.3 patch 25; |tp_firmware=Debian |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |oui_eth=00:D0:B8 }} {{TagLine|Iomega StorCenter ix2-dl}} :[http://download.lenovo.com/lenovoemc/na/en/app/cust_alp/p/1031%2c1149.html Support page]
"11014-1M", "48.63Y01.10M" and "HOMEMEDIA MB" :are silkscreened on the board.
